EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Data Repositories 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Data Repositories - Best Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Data Repositories with Oliver Gierke and Thomas Darimont. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 18, 2014 North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=669892342> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 892 342
Thank you,
